link_desc:
Zabbix template and config file for monitoring Jira - issue tracking software developed by Atlassian.
Passive and active checks. Provides monitoring statistics from jira mysql database.

Installation:

1. Import template in Zabbix Web ui
2. Add jira.conf file to Zabbix Agent includes dir (or add UserParameters lines to agent config file)
3. In jira.conf, replace SECRETPASSWORD with your jira mysql database password
4. Connect proper template to host (for active or passive checks)
5. Restart agent

Tested on Zabbix 2.4
author: Mikolaj Porczynski
